terms of health services
•Are services technically sound?
•Are services technically appropriate?
•Are there guidelines and measures to ensure quality
control?
•Are services cost-effective?
•Do communities actively participate in health careactivities?
•Do services help in solving the identified problems?
In terms of resources
•Are health providers competent ?
•Are facilities and equipment appropriate, adequate and
in good condition?
•Are supplies and materials adequate and usedefficiently?
